name: Patchwork (itch) (Tepig125)
description:
A submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, for which the theme was "joined together". This project was created by myself (Tepig125) and my friend, TheJabberwocky, the latter of whom created all the art while I did the coding!

You play as a Frankenstein's monster-like creature who has separated from his limbs, and now must go on an adventure to stitch himself back together! As you join together with your limbs, your movement capabilities are altered according to your size and mass.

(Edit (6/13/2021): Turns out I linked the wrong person when I linked Jabberwocky earlier, so I fixed that! Sorry about that ^-^;
